leaflet.constituency: Gosport, Lee-on-the-Solent, Stubbington and Hill Head

messages.title: My priorities for Gosport, Lee-on-the-Solent, Stubbington and Hill Head
messages.content: 1. Respect the vote of local people and the country to leave the EU and get Brexit done! 2. Continue to prioritise local investment—we need jobs, roads and schools before new houses. 3. Ensure our area gets our fair share of the 20,000 extra police the Conservatives have pledged to tackle crime and anti-social behaviour. 4. Keep pushing for better local healthcare services, improved access to GP’s and reduced waiting times at QA Hospital. 5. Always be Gosport’s champion in Westminster but living and working locally, accessible and accountable to you.

messages.title: CAROLINE DINENAGE: A Strong Voice for Gosport
messages.content: Delivered a £70 million Enterprise Zone at Daedalus, with new businesses and colleges generating hundreds of jobs & training places. Secured the long-term future of HMS Sultan and championed armed forces welfare, winning medals for the WW2 Arctic Convoy Veterans. Supported local jobs and training to see unemployment reduced by 30% since 2010, and over 1,800 apprenticeships per year. Secured over £110 million investment in local roads, including the new Gosport access road (Stubbington Bypass). Continued to campaign against major housing developments on green fields and open spaces. Helped secure Government funding for the 200 extra police officers which Hampshire Constabulary are recruiting and training this year. Supported a successful QA Hospital bid to secure £58 million to improve A&E services for local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Respect the vote of local people and the country to leave the EU and get Brexit done.
Prioritise local investment for jobs, roads, and schools before new houses.
Ensure the area gets its fair share of the 20,000 extra police to tackle crime and anti-social behaviour.
Push for better local healthcare services, improved access to GPs, and reduced waiting times at QA Hospital.
Always be Gosport’s champion in Westminster while living and working locally, accessible and accountable to you.
